alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:23AM CST until March 05 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County. Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occur from Panama to Arkoma. Some local and county roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 34.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
